SV_AcademicSubjectsByStandard.name: SV_AcademicSubjectsByStandard
SV_AcademicSubjectsByStandard.queryString: select sub.SUBJECT_NAME as SUBJECT_NAME,stnd.STANDARD_NAME as STANDARD_NAME,acs.SUBJECT_TEACHER as SUBJECT_TEACHER from ACADEMIC_SUBJECTS acs,SUBJECT_DETAILS sub,STANDARD_DETAILS stnd where acs.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:year and acs.STANDARD_ID=:standard and acs.SUBJECT_ID=sub.SUBJECT_ID and acs.STANDARD_ID=stnd.STANDARD_ID
SV_AcademicSubjectsByStandard.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select sub.SUBJECT_NAME as SUBJECT_NAME,stnd.STANDARD_NAME as STANDARD_NAME,acs.SUBJECT_TEACHER as SUBJECT_TEACHER from ACADEMIC_SUBJECTS acs,SUBJECT_DETAILS sub,STANDARD_DETAILS stnd where acs.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:year and acs.STANDARD_ID=:standard and acs.SUBJECT_ID=sub.SUBJECT_ID and acs.STANDARD_ID=stnd.STANDARD_ID) wmTempTable

SV_CountOfStudentPerGrade.name: SV_CountOfStudentPerGrade
SV_CountOfStudentPerGrade.queryString: select r.GRADE_ID as gradeId ,gd.GRADE as grade,count(r.STUDENT_ID) as studentId from RESULTS r, GRADE_DETAILS gd where r.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:academicYear and r.STANDARD_ID=:standardid and r.GRADE_ID=gd.GRADE_ID group by r.GRADE_ID
SV_CountOfStudentPerGrade.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select r.GRADE_ID as gradeId ,gd.GRADE as grade,count(r.STUDENT_ID) as studentId from RESULTS r, GRADE_DETAILS gd where r.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:academicYear and r.STANDARD_ID=:standardid and r.GRADE_ID=gd.GRADE_ID group by r.GRADE_ID) wmTempTable

SV_CountOfStudents.name: SV_CountOfStudents
SV_CountOfStudents.queryString: select count(STUDENT_ID),STANDARD_ID from STUDENT_ACADEMICS where STANDARD_ID=:standard and ACADEMIC_YEAR=:year group by STANDARD_ID
SV_CountOfStudents.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(STUDENT_ID),STANDARD_ID from STUDENT_ACADEMICS where STANDARD_ID=:standard and ACADEMIC_YEAR=:year group by STANDARD_ID) wmTempTable

SV_GetSTudentResultsForStandard.name: SV_GetSTudentResultsForStandard
SV_GetSTudentResultsForStandard.queryString: select sum(r.MARKS_SECURED) as MARKS_SECURED, r.STUDENT_ID as STUDENTID,s.STUDENT_NAME as STUDENTNAME ,r.TEST_CONDUCTED_ID,td.TEST_ID as TESTID,td.TEST_NAME as TESTNAME from RESULTS r, STUDENT_DETAILS s, TEST_CONDUCTED t, TEST_DETAILS td where r.TEST_CONDUCTED_ID=t.TEST_CONDUCTED_ID and r.STUDENT_ID=s.STUDENT_ID and t.TEST_ID=td.TEST_ID and r.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:academicYear and r.STANDARD_ID=:standardid and t.TEST_ID=:testid group by r.STUDENT_ID, td.TEST_NAME
SV_GetSTudentResultsForStandard.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select sum(r.MARKS_SECURED) as MARKS_SECURED, r.STUDENT_ID as STUDENTID,s.STUDENT_NAME as STUDENTNAME ,r.TEST_CONDUCTED_ID,td.TEST_ID as TESTID,td.TEST_NAME as TESTNAME from RESULTS r, STUDENT_DETAILS s, TEST_CONDUCTED t, TEST_DETAILS td where r.TEST_CONDUCTED_ID=t.TEST_CONDUCTED_ID and r.STUDENT_ID=s.STUDENT_ID and t.TEST_ID=td.TEST_ID and r.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:academicYear and r.STANDARD_ID=:standardid and t.TEST_ID=:testid group by r.STUDENT_ID, td.TEST_NAME) wmTempTable

SV_Top3StudentsFromAllStandards.name: SV_Top3StudentsFromAllStandards
SV_Top3StudentsFromAllStandards.queryString:
SELECT
 *
FROM VIEW_RESULTS V1
WHERE V1.TEST_ID=:TESTID AND V1.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:ACADEMICYEAR AND V1.TOTAL_MARKS >= (SELECT
                          SUBSTRING_INDEX(
                              SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT V2.TOTAL_MARKS ORDER BY V2.TOTAL_MARKS DESC), ',',
                                              3), ',', -1) MARKS
                        FROM VIEW_RESULTS V2
                        WHERE V1.STANDARD_ID = V2.STANDARD_ID AND V1.TEST_ID = V2.TEST_ID
                        GROUP BY
                          STANDARD_ID,
                          TEST_ID)
ORDER BY STANDARD_ID, TEST_ID
SV_Top3StudentsFromAllStandards.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT
 *
FROM VIEW_RESULTS V1
WHERE V1.TEST_ID=:TESTID AND V1.ACADEMIC_YEAR=:ACADEMICYEAR AND V1.TOTAL_MARKS >= (SELECT
                          SUBSTRING_INDEX(
                              SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT V2.TOTAL_MARKS ORDER BY V2.TOTAL_MARKS DESC), ',',
                                              3), ',', -1) MARKS
                        FROM VIEW_RESULTS V2
                        WHERE V1.STANDARD_ID = V2.STANDARD_ID AND V1.TEST_ID = V2.TEST_ID
                        GROUP BY
                          STANDARD_ID,
                          TEST_ID)
ORDER BY STANDARD_ID, TEST_ID) wmTempTable
